response.overview: Ogochalo Mon is a soulful Bengali music video starring Rakesh Sen, Ira Dey, and Pranab Kr Nath, set against the backdrop of a martial-themed love story. Sung and composed by Pithwiraj Saha, with lyrics by Subhrajit Mahajan, the video explores a tale of passion, conflict, and emotional intensity. Directed by Pithwiraj Saha and produced by Rakesh Sen under Visionair Production, this project blends powerful storytelling with evocative music, offering a captivating cinematic experience.
response.title: Ogochalo Mon
